description.value:
Frequency once per day

You have been granted a sliver of the power of the yamaraj, the magistrates of the dead who agreed to allow duskwalkers to exist at all. You exhale a blast of icy wind and ravenous insects. This is a @Template[cone|distance:30] that deals @Damage[14d6[slashing],4d6[persistent,slashing]|options:area-damage] damage (@Check[reflex|against:class-spell|basic|options:area-effect] save using your class or spell DC, whichever is higher). On a critical failure, targets also become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 2}.
